text: Do the CRM Card serverless functions only have a 2 second run time limit? That seems....really low.
API endpoint functions will have a 10 second execution limit
Hmmm that's what I thought. Running into a weird issue with CRM Cards then timing out after 2.05 seconds :v Thanks Carter
Yeah, card functions are kinda separate from endpoint functions let me run some tests

CRM Cards have a 2 second limit. This is ridiculous and makes things like even the HubSpot provided example CRM cards not load due to time limit. I have made a post about this issue:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/Function-Run-Time-of-2-Seconds-for-CRM-Cards-is-Horrendous/m-p/713523#M13>
Yes, confirmed that it’s 2 min timeout. Can you tell me more about your problems and why you think it’s low (and not disagreeing with you, just gathering more information)
Totally agree with you, especially for things like search endpoints
If we were able to trigger crm card functions via webhooks we could easily build workarounds for this
And some other really cool stuff like WebRTC

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> For one, I can't even get the HubSpot provided examples to work due to the time limit. For two, most API's that need to go through a CORS server automatically add atleast a second for authorization.
